column6:
Five words to strike fear into the hearts of spies and evildoers everywhere: Jamie Madrox, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. Except Madrox has decided that it's time to start gathering in the stray dupes that are still wandering around, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agent doesn't especially want to go...and S.H.I.E.L.D. isn't especially inclined to let him go. ,2006,12
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Pablo Raimondi | colorist:Brian Reber
